name: query-quest
description: CS.4347 Project: Query Quest - A trivia game

scripts.dev: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm --parallel --color run dev
scripts.dev:client: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm --parallel --color --filter client run dev
scripts.dev:server: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm --parallel --color --filter server run dev
scripts.preview: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm --parallel --color run preview
